types.name: codewhispererAutomatedTriggerType
types.description: The type of the Automated trigger to send request to CodeWhisperer service

types.name: codewhispererCodeScanJobId
types.description: The ID of the security scan job

types.name: codewhispererCodeScanLines
types.description: How many lines of code being sent for security scan

types.name: codewhispererCodeScanPayloadBytes
types.description: The payload size in bytes of customer project context sent for security scan

types.name: codewhispererCodeScanTotalIssues
types.description: The number of security issues been detected

types.name: codewhispererCompletionType
types.description: Completion Type of the inference results returned from CodeWhisperer model layer

types.name: codewhispererCursorOffset
types.description: cursor location offset in the editor when invoking CodeWhisperer for recommendation

types.name: codewhispererLanguage
types.description: Programming language of the CodeWhisperer recommendation

types.name: codewhispererLastSuggestionIndex
types.description: The last index of recommendation from a particular response

types.name: codewhispererLineNumber
types.description: The line number of the cursor when the event happens

types.name: codewhispererModificationPercentage
types.description: The percentage of user modifications on the suggested code

types.name: codewhispererPaginationProgress
types.description: The number of recommendations received so far when user makes a decision

types.name: codewhispererRequestId
types.description: The ID of the request to CodeWhisperer service

types.name: codewhispererRuntime
types.description: the pre-defined set of values for runtime version of the language of CodeWhisperer recommendation

types.name: codewhispererRuntimeSource
types.description: the original (free-text) of the runtime version of the language of CodeWhisperer recommendation

types.name: codewhispererSessionId
types.description: The unique identifier for a CodeWhisperer session(which can contain multiple requests)

types.name: codewhispererSuggestionIndex
types.description: The index for each suggestion, respectively, in the list of suggestions returned from service invocation

types.name: codewhispererSuggestionReferences
types.description: The list of unique license names for a particular suggestion

types.name: codewhispererSuggestionReferenceCount
types.description: Number of references the particular suggestion is referenced with.

types.name: codewhispererSuggestionState
types.description: User decision of each of the suggestion returned from CodeWhisperer

types.name: codewhispererTriggerType
types.description: The type of the user trigger to send request to CodeWhisperer service

types.name: reason
types.description: Reason of the CodeWhisperer event

metrics.name: aws_openLocalTerminal
metrics.description: Open local terminal with aws connection injected

metrics.name: codewhisperer_securityScan
metrics.description: Client side invocation of the CodeWhisperer Security Scan

metrics.name: codewhisperer_serviceInvocation
metrics.description: Client side invocation of the CodeWhisperer service for suggestion

metrics.name: codewhisperer_userDecision
metrics.description: User acceptance or rejection of each suggestion returned by the CodeWhisperer service request

metrics.name: codewhisperer_userModification
metrics.description: Percentage of user modifications for the selected suggestion until a fixed period of time
